```{r}
#| label: cvevents
cvevents <- function(tbl, when, what, where, details) {
  command_start <- "\\cvevent"

  res <- paste0(
    command_start,
    "{",
    tbl[[when]],
    "}",
    "{",
    tbl[[what]],
    "}",
    "{",
    tbl[[where]],
    "}"
  )

  tbl[[details]] <- sapply(tbl[[details]], function(x) {
    paste0("{", x, "}", collapse = ",")
  })
  res <- paste0(res, "{", tbl[[details]], "}")

  cat(res, sep = "\n")
}
```

```{r}
#| label: cvskills
cvskills <- function(tbl, when, what, where, details) {

    "{",
    tbl[[where]],
    "}"
  )

  tbl[[details]] <- sapply(tbl[[details]], function(x) {
    paste0("{", x, "}", collapse = ",")
  })
  res <- paste0(res, "{", tbl[[details]], "}")

  cat(res, sep = "\n")
}
```

# Summary
